author: Patsy McGarry
title: Coronavirus: Retired archbishop says over-70s ‘deceived and misled’ on cocooning
description: John Neill says he is ‘extremely annoyed’ over clarification cocooning is not mandatory
content:
A retired Church of Ireland archbishop has described himself and his wife as extremely annoyed that we older people have been deceived and misled in the midst of the current Covid-19 crisis. 
His comments follow clarification by the Department of Health in r… [+2639 chars]
